titleStmt.title: Charis kai eirēnē, or, Some considerations upon the Act of uniformity with an expedient for the satisfaction of the clergy within the province of Canterbury / by a servant of the God of peace.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

notesStmt.note: First three words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
